thread.title: Ice T and Wife Coco Austin Celebrate 23 Years of Marriage: ‚ÄòIt Gets Better Every Year‚Äô
thread.title_full: Ice T and Wife Coco Austin Celebrate 23 Years of Marriage: ‚ÄòIt Gets Better Every Year‚Äô

author: Ny MaGee
title: Ice T and Wife Coco Austin Celebrate 23 Years of Marriage: ‚ÄòIt Gets Better Every Year‚Äô
text: *Ice T and his wife, Coco Austin, rang in the new year celebrating their 23rd anniversary. The old-school rapper [posted a #throwback photo](https://www.instagram.com/p/C1h7SHwuZ0i/?utm_source=ig_web_copy_link) of himself with his longtime love, and he captioned it, ‚ÄúToday is Coco and my 23rd Anniversary!‚Äù he wrote. ‚ÄúKeep it fun, Keep it sexy, and by all means ‚ÄòStay in LOVE!‚Äô It just gets better every year.‚Äù A separate post shows the couple celebrating the new year. Ice-T [captioned the sexy image](https://www.instagram.com/p/C1lFikkOcSY/?utm_source=ig_web_copy_link&igsh=MzRlODBiNWFlZA==): ‚ÄúCoco and I kept it Sexy as usual for NewYearsEve and our 23rd Anniversary! [@treachtribe](https://www.instagram.com/treachtribe/) and I kept it Gangster.üí• I wish nothing but the BEST for all of you! Stay healthy and make 2024 your year.‚Äù Some social media users responded with hateful comments about Coco‚Äôs sexy attire in the images, prompting the ‚ÄúLaw & Order: Special Victims Unit‚Äù star to [issue a statement on X/Twiter](https://x.com/FINALLEVEL/status/1742338116860739885?s=20) that read, ‚ÄúSo far this New Year I‚Äôve got nothing but Love from everyone! ‚ù§Ô∏è Of course a couple a females Hating on Coco‚Ä¶ I decided to just Block and not even acknowledge the miserable bitches‚Ä¶‚Äù Austin posted a picture from their [2011 vow renewal ceremony](https://www.instagram.com/p/C1iI70HrioY/?utm_source=ig_web_copy_link&igsh=MzRlODBiNWFlZA==) on New Year‚Äôs Day. She captioned the image: ‚ÄúHere‚Äôs to 23 years with this guy!! My rock! My diamond in the rough! Love you beyond [#HappyAnniversary](https://www.instagram.com/explore/tags/happyanniversary/) [#HappyNewYear2024](https://www.instagram.com/explore/tags/happynewyear2024/) [#nowordscandescribe](https://www.instagram.com/explore/tags/nowordscandescribe/).‚Äù View this post on Instagram Ice-T spoke about the vow renewal in a 2023 interview with [People](https://people.com/ice-t-shares-favorite-las-vegas-wedding-memory-with-coco-austin-7968216#:~:text=%22We%20never%20really%20told%20anybody,We%20didn't.). ‚ÄúWe made an agreement that we would renew the vows in five years. We didn‚Äôt. We did it in 10 years on Ice Loves Coco. We had a big thing in L.A. and it was better, because we had been married 10 years,‚Äù Ice-T told the outlet. Ice and Coco married in 2002 and have one minor daughter.
